description.diamond-pearl:
The user calls out
its underlings to heal
it. The user regains
up to half of its
max HP.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Heals the user for half its max HP.
effect.shortEffect: Heals the user by half its max HP.
